extendedInfo.description: Monster beads are alive! They are more than toys and now you can play with all of them! It's raining Monster beads, Aleluya! Get them with you to give them a new life. Enjoy Monster Beads!

reviews.title: monster beads
reviews.comment: r these an actual toy product u can buy in stores? guess they haven\'t hit Australia yet if so? either way this is pretty sucky. & makes u not want 2 buy ANYTHinG these people make. specially if u make the mistake of playing with through volume audible. that song!! so hideously sugar sweet. why do advertisers think little girls like 2 hear such sickly sweet garbage? blah Yuk grrr
reviews.author: A Google User
